Data: Indicators from "Under the Radar" attacks documented in Pacific Rim Report

Netcat clone with enhanced feature set (encrypted comms) (MITRE ATT&CK Tactic: Execution)

sdb hash (MITRE ATT&CK Tactic: Command and Control)
